TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract OlkSenderPhoto implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._OlkSenderPhoto, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlkSenderPhotoEvents_Event

summary.span: 为可以通过电子邮件接收的项目显示发件人的联系人图片的控件。

span.span: A control that displays the sender’s contact picture for items that can be received via e-mail.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的事件成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the event members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 之前您使用此控件在窗体设计器中，第一次将Microsoft Outlook发件人图片控件添加到控件工具箱。

span.span: Before you use this control for the first time in the forms designer, add the Microsoft Outlook Sender Photo Control to the control toolbox.

para.span: 仅可以将此控件添加到 Outlook 窗体使用窗体设计器; 在窗体区域您不能将此控件添加到 Visual Basic UserForm对象在 Visual Basic 编辑器中。

span.span: You can only add this control to a form region in an Outlook form using the forms designer; you cannot add this control to a Visual Basic UserForm object in the Visual Basic Editor.

para.span: 此控件支持 Microsoft Windows 主题。

span.span: This control supports Microsoft Windows themes.

para.span: 如果发件人没有联系人项目或联系人图片，则此控件为空。运行时右键单击此控件将显示发件人的个人菜单，下面显示了一个示例。

span.span: If no contact item or contact picture exists for the sender, the control is blank. Right-clicking the control at runtime will display the sender's persona menu, an example of which is shown below.

para.span: 双击此控件将显示联系人项目检查器。

span.span: Double-clicking the control will display the contact item inspector.

para.span: 有关 Outlook 控件的详细信息，请参阅自定义窗体中的控件

span.span: For more information about Outlook controls, see Controls in a Custom Form
